name: GhostKenPon
description:
A game made for "A game by its cover jam 2016"

Made on Construt2 and Krita in 4 days.

The artist who inspired us for the game can be found here :

http://famicase.com/16/softs/108.html

It was to be a musical game, but ran out of time.

Music is "Sakuranbo" from Ai Otsuka
